availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Dangerfield (Green County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, carpenter and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Martha A.H. Jones Carpenter. Father of William B. Dangerfield, Robert M. Dangerfield, Elizabeth A. Dangerfield, Susan C. Dangerfield, Benjamin M. Dangerfield, Mary F. Dangerfield, and George A. Dangerfield. Carpenter in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 127B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 623.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 460B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
